      java.util.concurrent.Future<?> TaskEngine.scheduleImmediate(long period, Task<?> task)

      <V> java.util.concurrent.Future<V> TaskEngine.submitDelayed(long delay, Task<V> task)
      Submit a Task to run after waiting some amount of time
      <V> java.util.concurrent.Future<V> TaskEngine.submitImmediate(Task<V> task)

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CancellableTask<V>
      A Task which can be cancelled (via the task itself).
      class  CountedTask<V>
      A Task which will only execute a certain number of times (at least once).
      class  ErrorLoggingTask<V>
      A Task which will catch any errors from its execution and log them.
